name: NYX: Nine Lives
description:
COYOTE & CO.

Joeniel "Joe" Abiad - UI Designer & Programmer

Tommaso Bovio - Chief Designer & Programmer

Marco Del Forno - Lead Concept Artist

Francesco M. (El) Fiore - Level Designer & Narrative Designer

Sarah Giavenni - Lead Level Designer

Luca Lanzellotti - Programmer & Game Designer

Iacopo Lingeri - Level Designer & Concept Artist

Annalisa Spera - Sound Designer & Composer

Created during this year's Global Game Jam, this game was developed using the theme Duality as its main focus and made in the span of 48 hours.

We are looking forward to work on NYX in the future and expand its world and gameplay, so expect updates when we will be ready to share them!

Keep in mind that the game may contain bugs or glitches, so don't hesitate to contact us if you encounter any kind of issue.
We can't wait to receive your feedback!

The whole squad after the 48-hour online crunch

Greetings from Italy, and happy gaming!
